title: Blended Learning-Based Science Teaching Methods Workshop for Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Five or more years of secondary science education experience and basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening Activity-Based Learning and Collaborative Learning Strategies in a Smartphone-Centric Restricted Technology Environment

learning_goals: Participants can design activity-based science lessons in blended learning environments with over 80% accuracy.
Participants can develop science lab classes applying collaborative learning strategies using smartphone apps.
Participants can reconstruct open-source educational materials to create science education content tailored to their local environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
